text: Luz Rodriguez (born 27 May 1991) is a Mexican footballer who plays for Estudiantes de Mérida in Venezuela.Luz Lorenzo Rodríguez, nuevo jugador del Estudiantes de Mérida BeSoccer ==Career== Rodriguez started his senior career with C. F. Millonarios de la Joya. After that, he played for Excelsior, Potroes UAEM, and Miami United. In 2016, he signed for Estudiantes de Mérida in the Venezuelan Primera División, where he has made seventy-three appearances and scored sixteen goals.at Soccerway == References == == External links == * Venezuela, the paradise of a Mexican * A national rocket; the globetrotter * "Refugee" in Venezuela * Mexican wants to demonstrate Aztec talent in Venezuela * Who is Luz Rodríguez, the only Mexican who plays the Libertadores 2020? * The only Mexican in Copa Libertadores starts the dream against Racing this Thursday Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Estudiantes de Mérida players Category:Mexican expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Venezuela Category:Potros UAEM footballers
title: Luz Rodríguez (footballer)
